text: Boise City is a city in Oklahoma in the United States. It is the county seat of Cimarron County. ==History== Boise City was founded in 1908, and was incorporated in 1925. It was severely affected by the dust bowl. It was mistakenly bombed by a U.S. bomber crew during training on July 5, 1943, during World War II. Category:County seats in Oklahoma Category:Cities in Oklahoma
title: Boise City, Oklahoma
